title: Constant 150-200 ping
body: I called AT&T wondering if they could help me, i bought a brand new modem attempting to fix the problem and I still have 150 ping.... A couple months ago I used to run it at least 100. Anything I can do??? (I live on the east coast)

replies.body:
Hey TAZ Zeus!

Given your explanation, this seems like this may be due to a routing issue.  The best way to confirm this is by having you run tracerts.  Make sure download the following and run a trace to the following IP's:

http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/

216.133.234.62
192.64.170.62

You can run it for about 30 seconds for each ip and export it as a text and attach it to your reply.  It should allow me to see the route your connection is taking and whether this is the root cause to your higher ping!

> Hey TAZ Zeus!
> 
> Given your explanation, this seems like this may be due to a routing issue.  The best way to confirm this is by having you run tracerts.  Make sure download the following and run a trace to the following IP's:
> 
> http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/
> 
> 216.133.234.62
> 192.64.170.62
> 
> You can run it for about 30 seconds for each ip and export it as a text and attach it to your reply.  It should allow me to see the route your connection is taking and whether this is the root cause to your higher ping!
I'm having the same exact problems....

I'm having a similar problem. Tonight though I had a real epiphany. I've been playing normals since I've been on tilt for a while and have been for about a week. SO while playing I realized that my ping rarely spiked at all and when it did was only to about 115 from 100. I recently got out of a ranked match and the ping never went under 135.......like really? I think there is something wrong with the ranked servers since it seemed to only happen in ranked play and not during normals. 

It was really weird and kinda makes me think i'd rather not play ranked if my ping is going to spike by 35% just by switching game modes and wanting to put my skills against others. The odd thing is that its with all the same programs running and everything. So maybe we need to look at what is going on in ranked since it seems to be where I"ve seen the problem.
Hello I've also had my ping up to about 140 each game i dunno what the problem is .

This doesn't seem to be related to your Network Path at all, as it shows right around 100 as your normal ping.  Given this, I recommend that you [submit a ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and include the following Network Logs so that we can have a better understanding of your connection:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

Hope this helps!
I have the same problem friend.. I live on the east coast too and have this random 150-200 ping the whole game and I had like average 100 1 week ago.
